sn22.36:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.36:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.36:1.7: yam nanumiyati na tena sankham gacchati”ti.
sn22.36:2.1: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi”ti?
sn22.36:2.9: Rupance, bhante, nanuseti na tam anumiyati;
sn22.36:2.10: yam nanumiyati na tena sankham gacchati.
sn22.36:2.15: yam nanumiyati na tena sankham gacchati.
sn22.36:2.16: Imassa khvaham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami”ti.
sn22.36:3.2: Sadhu kho tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi.
sn22.36:3.10: Rupance, bhikkhu, nanuseti na tam anumiyati;
sn22.36:3.11: yam nanumiyati na tena sankham gacchati.
sn22.36:3.16: yam nanumiyati na tena sankham gacchati.
sn22.36:3.17: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attho datthabbo”ti …pe…
sn22.36:3.18: annataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahatam ahositi.
